articles.title: Musical-Premiere: Münchner klatschen für Bullys Apachen | Regional
articles.description: München –  Im Deutschen Theater gibt's  Bully Herbigs Kultfilm „Der Schuh des Manitu“ nun als Musical.
articles.content:
München Silberbüchse, Blutsbrüder und Ohrwürmer. Im Deutschen Theater singt der Indianer.
Bully Herbigs Kultfilm Der Schuh des Manitu läuft für drei Monate als Musical in München. Die Besucher lache… [+766 chars]

articles.author: Tom McIlroy
articles.title: Exorcist trilogy threatens to move to US over Aussie tax change
articles.description: Pressure is building on the Morrison government over changes to tax offsets designed to support major film and TV productions in Australia
articles.content:
A Blumhouse spokesman said the rebate changes were concerning and could see Australia lose work and local jobs.

articles.author: Christopher Mathias, Ryan J. Reilly
articles.title: He Attacked Cops At The Capitol. The FBI Interviewed Him. Then He Rejoined The Army.
articles.description: James Mault was caught on film attacking officers during the Jan. 6 attack and lost his civilian job. So he rejoined the military while under FBI investigation.
articles.content:
James Mault was photographed spraying police with a chemical agent while officers were under siege by a violent mob of Trump supporters at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6.

articles.author: Wired
articles.title: Fujifilm's New Instax Printer Cranks Out Big, Glorious Photos
articles.description: Fujifilm's latest standalone smart printer uses their largest instant film for bigger, better prints.
articles.content: I can't lie: I am a huge fan of Fujifilm Instax printers. I like the Instax cameras too, but those have limited use cases, and most of the time I don't want to carry it around. I prefer to shoot with… [+2960 chars]

articles.author: Simon Lesage
articles.title: Vidéo. Pourquoi les musiques de James Bond se ressemblent autant ?
articles.description: Vidéo - De nombreux thèmes d’introduction des films James Bond portent en eux un motif musical vieux de près de soixante ans, qui fait office de ligne conductrice.
articles.content:
Les thèmes musicaux de James Bond ont un secret vieux de presque soixante ans. Tout le monde saccorde sur le fait quils se ressemblent, mais il est plus difficile didentifier pourquoi.
La ressemblan… [+558 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC
articles.title: Bam Margera, who was fired from latest "Jackass' film, sues to stop its release
articles.description: "Jackass" creator Bam Margera filed a lawsuit to stop the film "Jackass Forever" from being released, alleging he was illegally fired after a drug test showed he was taking prescription Adderall.
articles.content:
A "Jackass" creator who says he was illegally fired from the franchise's fourth film is suing to stop the October release of "Jackass Forever."
